successes.details: Led the transformation of our flagship product from a Windows-based on premise solution to an AWS Cloud-hosted platform capable of processing hundreds of GBs of DICOM file data daily.

successes.summary: Ongoing Collaboration with Data Science Team
successes.details: Works closely with the Data Science team to integrate AI models within AWS, enhancing our product’s capabilities.
Quickly learned and developed a Docker release for a key partner, receiving positive feedback for delivering high-quality results.
Developed proof-of-concept applications connecting to Epic and Cerner FHIR sandboxes, paving the way for possible future company initiatives.
Transformed a complex, legacy codebase plagued by spaghetti code and quick fixes into a more maintainable and readable codebase while continuously adding features and resolving issues.
Initiated the inclusion of unit and integration testing into the CI/CD pipeline, enhancing the confidence of releases.
Played a vital role in transitioning the company’s version control system from Mercurial to GitHub repositories.
Established a weekly software engineer book club and served as a mentor to multiple junior developers.
Designed, developed, and maintained 65 healthcare APIs, connecting authorized applications to various health systems.
Improved the MEDITECH service by implementing a REST layer, facilitating seamless communication between applications and MEDITECH health systems.
Created an automated routine for the installation of the MEDITECH service at healthcare systems, streamlining deployment processes.
Successfully brought 13 MEDITECH sites live and installed at an additional 12 MEDITECH sites, expanding product reach.
Handled customer ticket requests and collaborated with customers to identify and implement solutions, ensuring their satisfaction.

Actively participated in quarterly Dev Summits to explore new technologies and approaches for product enhancement. Served as a member of the Culture Team, dedicated to cultivating a positive and desirable company culture.
Spearheaded the development and launch of a Patient Registries / Population Health product.
Built and managed the majority of the Patient Registries team, ensuring the right talent was in place for project success.
Initially oversaw an established team specializing in Physician Billing, ensuring efficient operations.
Played a crucial role as a member of the company’s Agile Committee, facilitating the transition of a 45-year-old company from entrenched Waterfall development methods to Agile practices.
Provided mentorship to three newly hired programmers, aiding in their professional growth.
Enhanced programming expertise through active involvement in multiple projects within the complex healthcare EHR industry.
Acquired proficiency in various MEDITECh proprietary languages through continuous learning and development efforts.
